name: Dark Furr
description:
Dark Furr is a highly difficult and dark platformer game that will challenge the players resolve and emotions as they follow a lost child on its journey to survive in an unfriendly world and return home.

Dark Furr is a 2d-platformer framed around the story of a small black ball of fur lost in a large, unfriendly world. This game is designed to test the patience, mental fortitude, and mechanical skill of any that would accept its challenge.

A momentum based platforming system will either reward or penalize players for precise execution and creativity in their use of the environment to move about. 

Credits

Music - Seth o'Dale in Unity Asset Store
Sprites, Textures, Materials- Palladadesign, Alien Nude LTD, Skipan, Nobiax/Yughues in Unity Asset Store, Game Developer Studio in OpenGameArt.org
Backgrounds - Steam TradingCards
